text: Visvasigale, khanditavagiyu dharmagurugalu mattu san'yasigalalli heccinavaru janara sampattannu akrama vidhanagalinda kabalisuttare mattu allahana margadinda tadeyuttare. (Avarigu) cinna hagu belliyannu allahana margadalli kharcumadade avugalannu sangrahisittukolluvavarigu kathina sikseya subhavarte nidiri
